name: Garden Nightmare
description:
Small game where you have to keep your garden as clean as possible !

The birds will eat some fruits from your plants and will poop some seeds, creating new plants. However, the more good plants you have the more bad plants are likely to appear. The goal of the game is to eliminate the bad plants, without destroying your crops ;)

CONTROLS:

Simple fps controls

- wasd to move

- Left mouse button to shoot

CREDITS:

Birds sounds: https://www.xeno-canto.org/  && https://freesound.org/

Other assets and code : me :)
